titles.title: A resolution honoring members of the radiation protection profession by designating the week of November 6 through November 12, 2005, as "National Radiation Protection Professionals Week."
A resolution honoring members of the radiation protection profession by designating the week of November 6 through November 12, 2005, as "National Radiation Protection Professionals Week."

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Designates the week of November 6-November 12, 2005, as National Radiation Protection Professionals Week.
